snippet.title: The Lacerator - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST THE LACERATOR ON STEAM 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2339330/The_Lacerator/

FOLLOW THE DEVELOPER 
@FernandoTittz
https://twitter.com/FernandoTittz

JOIN THE DISCORD
discord.gg/peAk4fUr2c

ALL MY LINKS
https://linktr.ee/FernandoTittzDev

___________________________________

CAN YOU SURVIVE THE LACERATOR?
- Explore a branching and bloody hideout
- Find items to progress and also to defend yourself
- Manage your resources in a limited inventory
- Beware of the many traps
- And the most important: Beware not to be LACERATED

You can lose a part of your body in real time, this may change your plans and the game course, but you need to keep going, you need to survive no matter what happens! ADAPT, OVERCOME YOUR FEARS, SURVIVE!!!

Music:
SEXY TIME by Kapirot
WORSE TURN by Matt “Darkvine” Posuniak @Darkvine Music
BEWARE OF CROWS by Kapirot
